column2: Project Role : Application Lead Project Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.  Must have skills : SAP BW on HANA Data Modeling & Development Good to have skills : NA Minimum  5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 years full time education Summary :As an Application Lead, you will be responsible for leading the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. Your typical day will involve utilizing your expertise in SAP BW on HANA Data Modeling & Development to develop and maintain applications that meet business requirements.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the development and maintenance of applications utilizing SAP BW on HANA Data Modeling & Development. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure applications meet business requirements. Act as the primary point of contact for application design, build, and configuration. Ensure applications are delivered on time and within budget. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Expertise in SAP BW on HANA Data Modeling & Development. Good To Have Skills:Experience with SAP HANA, SAP BOBJ, and SAP BODS. Strong understanding of data warehousing concepts and methodologies. Experience with ETL tools such as SAP Data Services or Informatica. Experience with SQL and database management systems. Solid grasp of software development methodologies and best practices. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in SAP BW on HANA Data Modeling & Development. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office.

column2: Project Role : Application Lead Project Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.  Must have skills : Data Engineering Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 YEARS OF EDUCATION Summary :As a Data Engineering Application Lead, you will be responsible for leading the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. Your typical day will involve working with data engineering tools and technologies, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and ensuring the successful delivery of data-driven solutions.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and implementation of data engineering solutions, leveraging tools and technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, analysts, and business stakeholders, to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions. Ensure the successful delivery of data-driven solutions, including data pipelines, data warehouses, and data lakes, by managing project timelines, resources, and budgets. Provide technical leadership and mentorship to junior team members, ensuring adherence to best practices and standards in data engineering. Stay updated with the latest advancements in data engineering and big data technologies, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in data engineering tools and technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, and Kafka. Must To Have Skills:Experience in designing and implementing data pipelines, data warehouses, and data lakes. Good To Have Skills:Experience with cloud-based data engineering platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP. Good To Have Skills:Experience with data modeling and database design. Strong understanding of distributed systems, data structures, and algorithms. Experience with programming languages such as Python, Java, or Scala. Experience with data integration and ETL tools such as Informatica, Talend, or DataStage. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in data engineering. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, software engineering, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification 15 YEARS OF EDUCATION

column2: As Data Engineer / Data Architect, you will be an integral part of the Nokia Standards AI Data practice, applying the latest advances in data science and engineering to put data at the center of 6G networks     You will join a high-performance global team committed to driving continuous improvement and world-class innovation in networking research     Your mission will focus on conceiving and building next-generation data platforms enabling cutting-edge network research     You will be instrumental in creating a strong link between concepts and implementations, disseminating best practices and data-driven research as core discipline across the organization           Your skills and experience        You have:       A master s degree (or higher) in computer science, artificial intelligence, telecommunications, or a related field     Three or more years of experience in engineering or applied research, in industry or academia     Strong understanding of data architecture principles and best practices, and establishing data governance frameworks     Strong understanding of data modeling, database design, and data integration techniques     Hands-on experience with designing data handling architecture (data warehouse, data lake, data mesh )     Practical knowledge of tools and products for such systems: message brokers, processing systems (Hadoop, Spark and state-of-the-art package solutions such as Databricks)     Knowledge of ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) processes and data governance principles     Strong understanding of data privacy and security aspects, including data encryption, access controls, and compliance regulations     Knowledge of cloud platforms, cloud-based data storage and data pipelines     Proficiency in one or more programming languages (Python )           It would be nice if you also had:       Good level of proficiency in system and software engineering     Knowledge, know-how in synthetic data generation techniques     Knowledge, know-how in data quality frameworks and data quality assessment     Knowledge on graph modeling, graph databases and technologies, semantic graphs     Knowledge of network telemetry techniques and data collection protocols     Observability frameworks and tools     Knowledge of standards specifications and practices from different standardization bodies           You are autonomous, proactive, and collaborative. You like to solve complex problems with elegant solutions using your ingenuity and teamwork.       What you will learn and contribute to          Shape the future of communication networks by demonstrating innovative solutions enabled by modern data architectures     Architect and develop next-generation data platforms and solve network automation use cases     Apply and expand your knowledge by identifying and developing new approaches for network digital twins, network sensing, AI/ML for networks     Contribute to future networks and 6G in world leading standardization organizations like IETF, ETSI, 3GPP, leading open-source projects (Linux Foundation Networking), hackathons, etc.

column2: Skills required       :      design, develop, and deploy Power BI scripts, DAX queries, perform SQL query, data warehouse. What you will do       :           The responsibilities of a Power BI Lead can vary from business to business. They can be hired to design and develop BI reports or to provide insights to improve decision-making.         Power BI Leads have a number of duties to perform and require thorough knowledge and expertise in business intelligence, databases, and technical BI concepts.         Power BI Leads are hired to meet various requirements. The following are the various roles and responsibilities of Power BI Leads:           To understand business requirements in the BI context and design data models to convert raw data to meaningful insights             To create dashboards and visual interactive reports using Power BI             To identify KPIs with clear objectives and monitor them consistently             To analyze data and present it through reports that can help in decision-making             To be able to convert business requirements into technical specifications and decide the timeline to accomplish tasks             To design, develop, and deploy Power BI scripts and perform efficient detailed analysis             To perform DAX queries and functions in Power BI             To create charts and document data with algorithms, parameters, models, and relations explanations             To conduct data warehouse development             To perform SQL querying for best results             To use filters and graphs for a better understanding of the data             To define and design new systems by analyzing current ETL processes             To make technical changes to existing BI systems in order to enhance their functioning           In a nutshell, a Power BI Lead is responsible for managing the entire BI system; they also aim to leverage Power BI for quick and smart real-time decisions.           Qualifications       :           Bachelor s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field (master s degree preferred).             Strong technical acumen and understanding of software development lifecycle (SDLC) methodologies.             Analytical mindset with the ability to identify and mitigate risks, solve problems, and make data-driven decisions.             Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

column2: Position: Technical Lead   Work Experience: 9 to 12 Years  Employment Type: Permanent  Location: Mumbai/Kolkata      Job Overview : As a senior member of the team, deliver production data pipelines while working in collaboration with product and application teams.  ??   Mentor data engineering talent  ??   Collaborate as part of a cross-functional Agile team to create and enhance software that enables state-of-the-art, next-generation big data and machine learning applications  ??   Leverage cloud-based architectures and technologies to move, transform, and secure data at scale  ??   Advocate for data engineering and software best practices Responsibilities: Data Management and Maintenance : Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency in databases and other storage ( S3 ) systems. This includes data cleaning, backup, recovery, and performance optimization. Technical Support and Troubleshooting : Data Support Engineers provide technical support to customers or internal teams. They troubleshoot data-related issues, identify root causes, and implement solutions to resolve problems. This often includes working with databases, data processing systems, and  data analytics  tools. System Integration and Development : Integrating new systems and technologies into the existing data infrastructure. This could involve working closely with other IT professionals to ensure compatibility and efficiency. Data Analysis and Reporting : Assisting in data analysis and preparing reports. This might require proficiency in specific data analytics and reporting tools and software. Collaboration with Cross-Functional Teams : Data Support Engineers often work closely with other departments, such as development, operations, and data science teams, to support data-related aspects of projects. They assist in integrating new technologies and systems that involve data processing and management. Compliance and Security : Ensuring data handling and storage comply with legal and regulatory requirements. This includes  managing permissions, monitoring data (IAM)  access, and safeguarding against data breaches. Continuous Learning and Improvement : Keeping up to date with the latest technologies and best data management and support practices. This often involves continuous learning and possibly certification in relevant areas. Problem Solving : Identifying and resolving data-related problems, ranging from minor glitches to significant system-wide issues requiring in-depth technical knowledge. Documentation and Reporting : Creating and maintaining documentation related to data systems, processes, and solutions is an important part of their role. They may also be involved in creating reports on data issues and resolutions.  Data Analysis Tools : Familiarity with data analysis tools and software, such as Excel, Tableau, or more advanced tools like R or Python for data manipulation and analysis. (Nice  to have) Programming Languages : Proficient in scripting languages like Python, Node JS, JavaScript Networking and System Administration:  Basic understanding of networking concepts and system administration, as data support often involves working with networked data systems. Data Nodes, cloud scales (h-Scale and V-Scales) Data Security : Knowledge of data security principles and practices to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of data. Data Security, Data Encryption (Data In-Transit and Data in Rest)  Data visualization/Report Tools : Power BI/Tableau/ Looker will be an added advantage. Analytical Skills: Data Interpretation : Ability to interpret and analyze data to identify trends, anomalies, and critical insights. Attention to Detail : Precision and attention to detail are crucial for managing and analyzing large datasets. Problem-solving : Strong problem-solving skills to diagnose issues and develop practical solutions. Soft Skills:  Communication : Excellent verbal and written communication skills to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders and work collaboratively with team members. Customer Service : Ability to provide high-quality customer service, including patience and a positive attitude when dealing with user issues. Should be able to monitor, troubleshoot, and maintain data pipelines to ensure that data is transferred smoothly. Should be able to monitor, troubleshoot, and maintain the ETL processes to make sure the aggregated data sets are generated timely in the Redshift DW and data quality is maintained. Time Management : Managing time effectively, especially when dealing with multiple issues or projects simultaneously. Teamwork : Ability to work effectively in a team environment, contributing to collaborative problem-solving. Adaptability : Adapting to new technologies and changes in the IT landscape, as data support roles, often involve continual learning and adaptation. Must-Have Skills/Competencies: Professional services experience, a strong plus Cloud provider certification is a strong plus. Python Advanced SQL Cloud-native data stores (Redshift, Athena, BigQuery, Synapse, Snowflake) Cloud storage (S3, GCS, Azure Blob Storage) Modern warehousing and data lake patterns Airflow or other orchestration tools Cloud Technologies (One or More of AWS, Azure, GCP): Security/networking basics Cloud-native tools for batch and streaming data processing Cloud native query engines Serverless cloud functions, a plus Visualization/reporting experience, a plus Nice to Have Skills/Competencies: 5+ years in building, scaling, and optimizing data pipelines. 3+ years of experience developing and deploying solutions in one or more of the public clouds - AWS, Azure, GCP 5+ years of professional experience in data wrangling in relational databases using SQL. 5+ years experience with object-oriented programming design best practices 5+ years of experience using source control (git) Experience promoting data pipeline through development, testing, and production environments. A bachelor?? degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field is often required. Certifications for database management, data analysis, or specific technologies relevant to the role can enhance a candidate's qualifications.

With a completely digital approach, Datamatics portfolio spans across Information Technology Services, Business Process Management, Engineering Services, and Big Data & Analytics all powered by Artificial Intelligence. It has established products in Robotic Process Automation, Intelligent Document Processing, Business Intelligence, and Automatic Fare Collection. Datamatics services global customers across Banking, Financial Services, Insurance, Healthcare, Manufacturing, International Organizations, and Media & Publishing. The Company has a presence across 4 continents with major delivery centers in the USA, India, and Philippines. Datamatics is the first and only Indian organization to have won the prestigious International Asia Pacific Quality Award (IAPQA) in the services category, which included IT/ITES, Banks, Insurance companies and other services organizations. This is a unique achievement in the history of the Indian IT industry, as it was won competing against hundreds of companies from 38 countries including the US, Japan, Australia, New Zealand, Israel, South Korea, Peru, Mexico, China, Russia and Canada. column2: As a Data Architect, you will play a crucial role in designing and implementing efficient and scalable data      solutions for our organization.      Your primary responsibility will be to develop and maintain the overall data      architecture, ensuring that it aligns with the company's strategic objectives and supports the data needs of      various business functions.        Key Responsibilities:      1. Data Strategy Development: Collaborate with stakeholders, including business leaders, analysts, and      IT teams, to understand the organization's data requirements and develop a comprehensive data      strategy. This strategy should outline the data architecture, governance framework, data integration      processes, and data management policies.      2. Data Modeling and Design: Design and implement data models that accurately represent the      organization's data assets and align with the defined data strategy. This includes conceptual, logical,      and physical data models, ensuring data consistency, integrity, and security.      3. Data Integration: Identify and implement appropriate data integration techniques to enable efficient      and reliable data flow between various systems and applications. This involves understanding data      sources, data transformation requirements, and establishing data integration standards and best      practices.      4. Database Management: Collaborate with database administrators (DBAs) to design and optimize      database structures for performance and scalability. Ensure data quality and implement data security      measures to protect sensitive information.      5. Data Governance and Compliance: Establish data governance practices and policies to ensure data      quality, integrity, and security. Develop and implement data standards, data classification, and data      lineage frameworks. Ensure compliance with relevant data regulations and privacy laws.      6. Data Analytics Support: Collaborate with data analysts and data scientists to provide guidance on      data availability, accessibility, and usability. Support the implementation and maintenance of data      analytics platforms, tools, and technologies.      7. Documentation and Communication: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of the data      architecture, data models, and data flows. Communicate complex technical concepts to non-      technical stakeholders effectively.      8. Stay Updated: Stay abreast of emerging data technologies, industry trends, and best practices in data      architecture and data management. Continuously evaluate and recommend new tools and      methodologies to improve data-related processes.      Qualifications and Requirements:      8+ Years of experience in Data Architecture, Bachelor s or Master's degree in Computer Science,        Information Systems, or a related field.      Proven experience as a Data Architect or similar role.      Strong understanding of data modeling, database design, and data integration techniques.      Proficiency in data modeling tools and methodologies (e.g., ERwin, PowerDesigner, UML).      Expertise in SQL and database management systems (e.g., Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL).      Knowledge of data governance, data quality, and data security best practices.      Familiarity with big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark) and cloud data platforms (e.g., AWS,      Azure, GCP) is a plus.      Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.      Strong communication and collaboration abilities.
column11: Computer science, Data management, UML, Data modeling, Database design, data security, MySQL, Data quality, Analytics, Data architecture

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Data Lake Architect to join our dynamic team. This role offers the opportunity to shape our data architecture, drive innovation, and contribute to the success of data-driven initiatives.         Responsibilities         Data Lake Design and Architecture: Develop and implement a robust and scalable data lake architecture.     Data Modeling: Design and implement effective data models that align with business requirements and ensure optimal performance.      Data Governance: Establish and enforce data governance policies, including data quality, security, and compliance standards.     Metadata Management: Implement metadata management strategies to catalog and document data assets within the data lake, ensuring proper data lineage and accessibility.     Data Integration and Ingestion: Lead the development of data integration processes to ingest data from various sources into the data lake.     Security and Access Control: Implement robust security measures, including encryption, access controls, and authentication mechanisms.     Scalability and Performance Optimization: Design and implement strategies to scale the data lake infrastructure and optimize performance based on evolving business needs.     Collaboration and Stakeholder Management: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data engineers, analysts, and business stakeholders.     Technology Evaluation and Adoption: Evaluate and recommend new tools and technologies to enhance the data lake ecosystem.     Training and Documentation: Assist in developing training content and provide documentation to support the platform.             Qualifications         Bachelors or Master s degree in Computer Science, or Information Technology.     14+ year of proven experience as a Data Engineer with 4+ year as Data Lake Architect.     In-depth knowledge of data lake architectures, technologies, and best practices.     Strong expertise in data modeling, data governance, and metadata management.     Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, PySpark, Scala.     Experience with cloud-based data lake platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS).     Hands on experience with (one or more from each line) :      Apache Airflow | Apache NiFi | Apache Oozie      AWS Glue Data Catalog | Azure Purview      Apache Sqoop | AWS DataSync | Azure Data Factory      Apache Kafka | AWS Kinesis | Azure Event Hubs         Experience working with version control platform e.g. git     Experience with JIRA, Confluence

column2: Seeking a highly skilled and experienced  Enterprise Data Management (EDM) Architect  to join our team. The ideal candidate must have at least 15 years of professional experience in data management, architecture, and analytics, with a proven track record of leading large-scale data projects. This role requires an individual who can design and implement comprehensive data strategies that support our organization's objectives and drive innovation. Additionally, the candidate should have working knowledge of MS Power BI, demonstrating proficiency in developing and deploying business intelligence solutions. Key Responsibilities: Develop and maintain the overall data management strategy, including the enterprise data model, data governance practices, data quality standards, and data lifecycle management. Lead the design and implementation of data architecture solutions that are scalable, reliable, and secure, supporting business objectives and data analytics needs. Collaborate with IT and business stakeholders to ensure that data strategies and architectures are aligned with business goals and IT infrastructure. Oversee the selection and implementation of data management tools and technologies, ensuring they meet organizational needs and are effectively integrated into the existing IT landscape. This includes proficiency in using MS Power BI for data visualization and business intelligence. Drive the adoption of data governance practices across the organization, including the establishment of data stewardship, data quality metrics, and data privacy standards. Provide leadership and guidance to data management teams, fostering a culture of continuous improvement and innovation in data practices. Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in data management, recommending and implementing changes to keep the organization at the forefront of data innovation. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field. A minimum of 15 years of experience in data management, with a focus on data architecture, data governance, and data analytics. Demonstrated experience leading large-scale data initiatives, from conception through implementation, in complex organizational environments. Expertise in data modeling, data integration, and data warehousing, with a deep understanding of traditional and emerging data technologies (e.g., SQL, NoSQL, Big Data platforms, cloud data services). Strong knowledge of data governance frameworks, data quality management, and data privacy regulations (e.g., GDPR, CCPA). Excellent leadership and communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex data concepts to technical and non-technical stakeholders. Proven ability to work collaboratively across functional teams, fostering a positive work environment and driving results. Working knowledge of MS Power BI, including the ability to develop reports, dashboards, and data models that provide insightful analytics and support decision-making processes.
column11: Enterprise Architecture, Data Architecture, EDM

column1: Data governance - informatica Consultant- Saudi Arabia
column2: Job Title: Data Governance with Informatica Consultant Location: Saudi Arabia Company Overview: [Insert Company Name] is a leading provider of [Brief Description of Company's Industry/Services], dedicated to delivering innovative solutions to our clients. We are currently seeking a highly skilled and experienced Data Governance with Informatica Consultant to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in data governance principles and practices, along with hands-on experience in implementing and configuring Informatica solutions. Key Responsibilities: Lead the design and implementation of data governance frameworks, policies, and processes to ensure the quality, integrity, and security of organizational data. Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to define data governance requirements and establish data standards, including data definitions, metadata management, and data lineage. Work closely with business and IT teams to assess data governance maturity levels, identify gaps, and develop roadmap strategies for improvement. Configure and customize Informatica Data Governance solutions, including Informatica Axon and Informatica Enterprise Data Catalog (EDC), to support data governance initiatives and objectives. Develop and maintain data governance artifacts, such as data dictionaries, data quality rules, and data stewardship workflows, within the Informatica platform. Provide guidance and training to data stewards and business users on data governance best practices, tools, and processes. Conduct data quality assessments and audits to monitor compliance with data governance policies and identify areas for improvement. Collaborate with IT teams to integrate Informatica Data Governance solutions with other data management and analytics platforms, ensuring seamless data governance across the enterprise. Stay current on industry trends and best practices related to data governance, data management, and regulatory compliance, and provide recommendations for enhancements or updates to data governance processes and tools. Serve as a subject matter expert on Informatica Data Governance solutions, providing technical expertise and support to project teams and stakeholders. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. Master's degree or professional certifications in data management or Informatica preferred. column2: Data Warehouse Design:    Define the architecture and structure of the data warehouse, including data models, schemas, and data integration processes.       Data Modeling:    Develop data models (e.g., star schema, snowflake schema) to optimize data storage and retrieval for reporting and analysis.       ETL (Extract, Transform, Load):    Design and oversee the implementation of ETL processes to extract data from source systems, transform it to meet business needs, and load it into the data warehouse.       Data Integration:    Ensure data from various sources (databases, applications, APIs) is integrated seamlessly into the data warehouse.       Performance Optimization:    Continuously monitor and optimize the data warehouse s performance to ensure efficient query processing and data retrieval.        Data Quality Assurance:    Implement data quality checks and validation processes to maintain data accuracy and consistency within the data warehouse.        Security and Access Control:    Establish security protocols and access controls to protect sensitive data within the data warehouse, ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations.        Scalability and Growth:    Plan for the scalability of the data warehouse to accommodate future data growth and evolving business requirements.        Documentation:    Maintain comprehensive documentation of the data warehouse architecture, data flows, and transformation processes.        Collaboration:    Work closely with business analysts, data analysts, and data engineers to understand data requirements and translate them into data warehouse solutions.        Vendor Evaluation:    Evaluate and recommend data warehousing tools and technologies, such as data warehouse platforms (e.g., Snowflake, Amazon Redshift, Azure Synapse Analytics), ETL tools, and BI tools. column2: Software Developers at IBM are the backbone of our strategic initiatives to design, code, test, and provide industry-leading solutions that make the world run today - planes and trains take off on time, bank transactions complete in the blink of an eye and the world remains safe because of the work our software developers do. Whether you are working on projects internally or for a client, software development is critical to the success of IBM and our clients worldwide. At IBM, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of. Your Role and Responsibilities As an MDM Data Engineer, you would be responsible for Define Master Data Architecture: Lead the design and maintenance of the Master Data architecture, ensuring scalability, flexibility, and alignment with industry best practices. Utilize advanced data modeling techniques to effectively model enterprise data domains such as Patient, Provider, Product, Customer, and Finance. Develop MDM Capabilities and Tool Evaluation: Define the MDM solution approach and style, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives and industry best practices. Gather and document Functional and Non-Functional Requirements to guide the MDM solution architecture. Participate in MDM tool selection activities, analyze available internal and external options, and provide recommendations on Build vs. Buy approach. Implement MDM Solution: Lay down the path of Installation & Upgrade. Create Data Mapping and assess impacts from business and technical perspectives. Develop MDM Algo, weight & perform pair analysis. Create Message broker and map HL7 or pipe delimited messages. Develop CV & Handler deliverables. Analyze and define detailed MDM processes, tasks, data flows, and dependencies. Design overall HA Infrastructure and support the build of the environments. Define and build MDM as a service in a micro-service pub/sub environment. Define & build Matching Engine tuning and development practices. Hands-on Experience of MDM implementation. Enforce Integrity through Data Governance and Data Quality: Collaborate with data governance teams to ensure that MDM solutions adhere to established data governance policies, standards, and procedures. Design and implement data quality checks and validation rules within the MDM solution to maintain high-quality Master Data. Develop strategies for data cleansing and enrichment to improve the accuracy and completeness of Master Data. Required Technical and Professional Expertise Overall experience of 18+ years of Industry experience. 15+ Years of experience on IBM MDM  Strong technical background in Master & Reference Data Management. In-depth, hands-on knowledge of best practices for building core MDM capabilities including Workflow, Matching, Hierarchy Management, and Security. 5+ years of MDM development, administration, and integrations experience. 10+ years of direct experience in MDM analysis, design, development, support, and operations with at least two leading MDM tool suites. 5+ years of technical knowledge on Data Architecture and Data Integration. Full life cycle implementation experience in MDM Solution in various domains such as Customer, Party, and Product, including additions, extension, business rule, PME tuning. 10-12 years of Java J2EE development & Python coding. At least 8 years of working experience in SOA technologies, tools, and governance. Experience with related Data Governance concepts and solutions (Business Glossaries, Data Catalog, Data Quality analysis and remediation, Data Lineage). Familiar with MDM trends, concepts, and available tools in the market including MDM solutions, AI/ML with MDM. In-depth knowledge and practical experience in managing Data Supply Chain and Data Lifecycle. Hands-on expert in data analysis within and outside data warehouse, data consolidation, and data management/governance. Able to lead a team and review designs independently, lead code reviews, and ensure quality throughout the project's life. Demonstrates strong communication, analytical, and organizational skills. Ability to manage day-to-day interactions effectively and relationships with a diverse group of colleagues. Experience resolving technical incidents and issues with the MDM product. Experienced in installation and Upgrades. Experienced in MDM Backup & recovery strategy. Experienced in Performance tuning. Knowledge of BAW and stewardship UI. Knowledge of Consent implementation. Knowledge of Account, Macro role & Party Relationship is required. Knowledge of tagging and onboarding data stewards. Knowledge of LDAP integration. Knowledge of Handler & composite view implementation. Knowledge of Notification. Knowledge of MDM Reporting strategy. Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Experience with other database platforms and technologies (e.g., DB2,Oracle, SQL Server). Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration tools. Knowledge of database regulatory compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).

column2: The position will be part of a Managed Services team providing Application Management and Maintenance for OpenText customers spread across the globe        Wide breadth of skills enabling one to solve complex problems in the areas of Application Availability, Performance and Capacity both in terms of incidents and problems      Experience in Production Operations (or Support) plus Software Maintenance (bug fixing, code maintenance) are a must                You are great at              Install, configure, maintain and monitor one or more OpenText (OT) products/solutions (Info Archive) implemented on OT Cloud, Customer premises, or 3rd party IaaS. Excellent grasp of the principles of Enterprise Content Management systems          Strong analytical skills combined with ability to work in a fast-paced environment with geographically distributed teams      Good team and interpersonal skills

column2: Responsibilities A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to lead the engagement effort of providing high-quality and value-adding consulting solutions to customers at different stages- from problem definition to diagnosis to solution design, development and deployment.  You will review the proposals prepared by consultants, provide guidance, and analyze the solutions defined for the client business problems to identify any potential risks and issues.  You will identify change Management requirements and propose a structured approach to client for managing the change using multiple communication mechanisms.  You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance.  You would be a key contributor in unit-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high-quality, value-adding consulting solutions to customers adhering to the guidelines and processes of the organization. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements: We are looking for candidates having a minimum of 9 years of hands on experience in development & implementation using latest versions OBIEE, ODI various modules of Oracle BI Apps. The candidates should have the ability to appreciate user requirements in BI domain and converting the same to design specs and architecting solutions.  We also require candidates with experience in Data Modeling for a BI Data Warehouse with an understanding of implications for ETL as well as reporting needs.  Candidate should also demonstrate strong analytical skills, problem solving/debugging skills. Location of posting is driven by business needs.  Experience and desire to work in a management consulting environment that requires regular travel.  Preferred Skills:  Technology->Business Intelligence - Reporting->Oracle Business Intelligence Enterprise Edition 12c Technology->Oracle Fusion Technology->ODI - Oracle Data Integrator  Additional Responsibilities: Good knowledge on software configuration management systems Strong business acumen, strategy and cross-industry thought leadership Awareness of latest technologies and Industry trends Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate Two or three industry domain knowledge  Understanding of the financial processes for various types of projects and the various pricing models available Client Interfacing skills Knowledge of SDLC and agile methodologies  Project and Team management  Educational Requirements Master of Science (Technology),Master Of Comp. Applications,Master Of Engineering,Master Of Technology,Bachelor Of Technology,Bachelor of Engineering  Service Line Enterprise Package Application Services *  Location of posting is subject to business requirements

column2: https://centroid.applytojob.com/apply/Sb0Gk8nHMe/Oracle-Apps-DBA-Architect-Full-Time   Oracle Apps DBA - Architect Full Time Centroid is seeking a Oracle Apps DBA- Architect with experience supporting large complex client environments as part of our Cloud Delivery Team with a focus on performance tuning, scripting and automation. As a senior technical member of the Managed Services team, you will take a lead role in troubleshooting and resolving the most complex issues for our customers mission-critical production environments as well as all aspects of administration for non-production environments. You will be expected to perform multiple functions, including the root cause analysis and assisting users with issues beyond what front-line support are able to resolve. Required Skillset: Minimum of 15 -20 years as an Oracle DBA with production support experience, including Oracle 10g/11g/12c/19c. 15 years of experience as an Oracle Apps DBA with Oracle EBS 11.5.10 and R12.x Strong understanding of Oracle RDBMS architecture Hands-on experience with implementation, upgrade, and tuning of: Large Oracle EBS environments, Oracle EBS in a production environment; throughout all stages of the lifecycle Enterprise Manager Grid Control 13c Backup and recovery concepts, including RMAN Oracle DB 12c/19c, Oracle RAC 12c/19c Patch assessment and application in an EBS environment with activation of different modules Performance Tuning (ie. Sql Queries), EBS Application Tier (Forms, Reports, Weblogic) Performance tuning OS (memory settings, disks io, cpu utilization) Must have strong Linux scripting (Python, bash scripting) Strong verbal, written, organizational and documentation skills. Proven experience with multiple operating systems: Linux/Unix/Solaris/Windows  Ability to provide accurate and realistic effort estimates, commit and deliver accordingly Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with occasional non-business hours (evenings and weekends) flexibility and able to prioritize and juggle multiple projects. column1: Senior Project Lead SDTM Delivery Programming

Leads the Requirement gathering, development of specifications, validation plans and performing end to end validation of Standard/Study macros.     Implements defensive programming techniques as a part of development lifecycle management of macros/programs/tools.     Project Manages end to end study and ensures deliverables are met on time.     Handles end to end studies (CDM (Clinical Data Management) To Submission).     Support the programmers in troubleshooting and debugging of complex standard and study programs/macros.     Acts as a technical owner and/or reviewer/approver for tools and programs developed in the group.     For complex programs & tools, oversee & coordinate a group of Programming in a matrix setting.     Establish and maintain effective working relationships with partners and stakeholders while assisting them through progress and challenges with deliverables.     Adhere to the relevant departmental SOPs (Standard Operating Procedures), corporate policies, regulatory requirements, and industry best practices.     Adhere to standards and aware of industry standards and updates.

column1: Data Modeler/ Information Architect/ Data Architect
column2: The Data Modeler/Architect is responsible for translating the enterprise business needs into conceptual, logical and physical data models. Provides expertise on data modeling tools, techniques and best practices and leads the design and implementation of the data architecture and data modeling solutions supporting enterprise information management, business intelligence, machine learning, data science, and other business interests across relational, dimensional and NoSQL databases. Has solid knowledge of data architectures, data stewardship and data governance.   Responsible for articulating modeling principles, visualize relationships between key business concepts and entities, create conceptual level data dictionaries, possess in-depth knowledge of Data warehousing, a top-notch data modeler designing data models that reduce data redundancy, streamlines data movements, and improves enterprise information management. The candidate must be able to work independently and collaboratively partnering with cross location business and technical teams   Essential Responsibilities:     Experience in Data Warehouse, Data Architecture, Design, Analysis, Modeling, Development, Testing, Implementation, Training and Documentation.   Hands on experience in creating database schemas, SQL, PLSQL programming and End-to-End ETL validations.   Experience with modeling tools like Erwin, Talend for Data Transformation (ETL) and Power BI Reporting   Experience in defining & implementing Data Management Strategies: -Data acquisition (Data integration & ETL), data inventory control (data cataloging) & data storage   Experience in Data Governance policies, practices: - covering data quality, accuracy, security & correctness   Experience in descriptive, diagnostic, predictive or prescriptive Data Analytics   Experience in Snowflake schema methods, identifying the dimensions, measures, Hierarchy levels for Fact and Dimension tables.   Strong in both Star schema and OLTP Schema   Expertise in designing for late arriving data and factless facts   Work with business and application/solution teams to implement data strategies, build data flows, and develop conceptual/logical/physical data models   Define and govern data modeling and design standards, tools, best practices, and related development for enterprise data models.   Define and maintain accurate functional data definitions and taxonomies for entities and attributes.   Working knowledge in Analysis Services (SSAS) and Integration Services (SSIS)   Exposure to Azure cloud components like Data Factory, Data Lake, SQL Database   Identify the architecture, infrastructure, and interfaces to data sources, tools supporting automated data loads, security concerns, analytic models, and data visualization.   Work proactively and independently to address project requirements and articulate issues/challenges to reduce project delivery risks.   Research latest data technologies and develop proof of concept     Additional Skills/Requirements :     Financial domain knowledge and business data models but not necessary   Knowledge of mathematical foundations and statistical analysis.   Analytical, flexible, team-oriented and have good interpersonal/communication skills     Education and/or Experience :     Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, or related technical discipline   8+ years of experience in designing and implementing EDW, BI & A solutions   Minimum 4 plus years of experience in Entity Relationship Models, Star Schema, Dimensional Modeling, and other Data Modeling Techniques and Methodologies

column2: Responsibilities A day in the life of an Infoscion   As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to lead the engagement effort of providing high-quality and value-adding consulting solutions to customers at different stages- from problem definition to diagnosis to solution design, development and deployment.   You will review the proposals prepared by consultants, provide guidance, and analyze the solutions defined for the client business problems to identify any potential risks and issues.   You will identify change Management requirements and propose a structured approach to client for managing the change using multiple communication mechanisms.   You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance.   You would be a key contributor in unit-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high-quality, value-adding consulting solutions to customers adhering to the guidelines and processes of the organization. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements:  9 + Years experience in Development and maintenance of XStore application using the appropriate technologies, frameworks, and programming languages.   Collaborate with the technical team and business stakeholders to define system architecture, identify integration points, and design scalable solutions that meet business requirements.   Work on the Xstore upgrade projects.   Implement new features and functionalities within the XStore system based on business requirements.   Integrate the XStore application with various third-party systems, such as payment gateways, inventory management systems, and customer relationship management (CRM) tools. Develop APIs or utilize existing APIs for seamless data exchange and integration.   Provide ongoing maintenance, bug fixing, and support for the XStore application. Troubleshoot issues reported by users or other team members and provide timely resolutions.  Preferred Skills: Technology->Oracle Industry Solutions->Retail Stores and Commerce (Micros)  Additional Responsibilities:  Good knowledge on software configuration management systems   Strong business acumen, strategy and cross-industry thought leadership   Awareness of latest technologies and Industry trends   Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate   Two or three industry domain knowledge   Understanding of the financial processes for various types of projects and the various pricing models available   Client Interfacing skills   Knowledge of SDLC and agile methodologies   Project and Team management  Educational Requirements Master of Science (Technology),Master Of Comp. Applications,Master Of Engineering,Master Of Technology,Bachelor Of Technology,Bachelor of Engineering  Service Line Enterprise Package Application Services * Location of posting is subject to business requirements

column2: Project Role :Quality Engineering Lead (Test Lead)  Project Role Description :Leads a team of quality engineers through multi-disciplinary team planning and ecosystem integration to accelerate delivery and drive quality across the application lifecycle. Applies business and functional knowledge to develop end-to-end testing strategies through the use of quality processes and methodologies. Applies testing methodologies, principles and processes to define and implement key metrics to manage and assess the testing process including test execution and defect resolution. Must have skills :Data Warehouse ETL Testing  Good to have skills :Informatica Administration Minimum 5 year(s) of experience is required  Educational Qualification :15 years of full time education Key Reponsibilities :A:Strong experience in ETL testing B:Shall be part of data analysis team working closely with Project Managers, Business Analysts, Release management and end users to validate data flow activity C:Validate inputs from multiple upstream systems and publish detailed analysis on the data quality D:Identify, analyze and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets E:Develop, design provide customized solutions to generate reports for business users to review and provide sign off Technical Experience : A:Must Have:Data Warehouse ETL Testing B:Good to have experience in Informatica 102 ETL development C:Good to have worked in Unix shell scripting D:Should have experience in Oracle PL/SQL is desirable E:good to have worked in any ETL related tools for profiling data as well as mapping from source to destination  Professional Attributes :a:Quick learner, looking for new challenges b:Fluency in English c:Strong communication skills d:Good interpersonal, logical and teamwork skills

column2: Data Engineering team is responsible for providing solutions across the spectrum of databases leveraging data engineering and devops tools and processes to meet evolving data storage, retrieval and transformation needs of the business     The Data Engineering team also responsible for setting up standards, processes and guidelines to support and maintain enterprise databases and protect critical data           What does a Tech Product Delivery Lead responsible for                 As part of the Data Engineering, you will be responsible for providing data engineering and ETL solutions across the spectrum of databases (RDBMS, NOSQL, Vector) and Informatica in the cloud and on-premises     Our Engineers provide broad technical expertise and solutions that is focused on providing our partners with an experience to be envy of with highest quality services that just works      Our services scale globally, are highly available, are resilient with business continuity     Working closely with application development, business and Operations in designing systems that meet complex business requirements     Working closely with our application development groups to understand their information and data needs and partnering with DevOps, Architecture, Application Development, Testing and Operations, along with Cloud Architecture and Engineering teams to enable, while practicing and promoting reliability engineering principles through self-service and automation                   What ideal qualifications, skills experience would help someone to be successful             8-10 years as a Informatica admin and Oracle/SQL DBA         Responsible for implementing scalable, well-performing, cohesive, and integrated Informatica infrastructure using Informatica PowerCenter, Informatica Power Exchange, and Informatica Data Quality.         Experience on IDMC (Informatica Intelligent Data Management Cloud) and Informatica CDGC (Informatica Cloud Data Governance and Catalog) is desirable.         Knowledge of RedHat Linux is required for managing the server-side applications.         Knowledge of Unix shell scripting is required for automating various operational activities.          Relied upon to troubleshoot Informatica at a service level, as well as assist in troubleshooting on the storage/OS side.         Act as an ambassador of the product to multiple teams such as Network, Application Development, Production Support, Database and Unix Administrators.         Possess a good understanding of Informatica ETL tool.         Hands-on experience with cloud native database technologies like redshift, Snowflake etc.         Experience in any two of the RDBMS databases like Oracle/SQL Server/MySQL/Postgres etc.           Decent expertise in Python/ shell/ Perl or Java programming           Understanding of data pipelines and ETL tools. Able to prepare data pipelines and build robust models using SQL, PySpark, Azure Data Studio, Data Bricks, Data Lake, Snowflake etc.         Experience working in a collaborative environment and with teams spread across multiple locations across multiple time zones.         Must possess good documentation skills (creating KBs, runbooks etc.)         Self-motivated, directed and with keen attention to detail.         Excellent interpersonal, verbal, and written communication skills as well as strong logical, analytical and problem-solving skills         Ability to critically think and automate the day-to-day routine activities.         Experience in supporting any of the Vector databases like Pinecone, Qdrant etc. is a big plus.         Experience/expertise on NOSQL databases like MongoDB, Cosmos etc. is a plus.         General understanding of data model, data mining is desirable.

Foster a culture of continuous improvement, innovation, and excellence in engineering practices. Must be aware about enterprise IT function and working proceess/methodologies                              Experience in developing conceptual, logical and physical data models, to support Business requirements                          Competence in constructing enterprise models through metadata modeling, with a focus on Analytics, AI, and ML.                          Experience in creating BRD, FDD & TDD for data & analytics project.                          Strong understanding on IT-OT connectivity and manufacturing application such as SCADA , PLC , ERP, HRMS, MES etc.                              Experience of implementing physical models for interfaces, data stores and/or cloud-based solutions                          A strong track record in optimizing data lake infrastructure to enhance data throughput, minimize downtime, and maximize scalability.                          Designing data integration, data management, data governance, and data quality assessment within the framework of ETL/ELT integration solutions for data engineering.                          Finalize architectural decisions across relational, multi-dimensional, cloud and distributed and object- based storage platforms                          Solid understanding of competitive Data Platforms                          Familiarity with modern big data tools and techniques                          Exposure to Snowflake and databases like SQL, Oracle                          Experience working AWS Data Stack using S3, EMR, Data Pipeline                          Development experience in NOSQL like HBASE or Cassandra                          Experience in building scalable service using REST/JSON                          Development experience serialization framework Avro or Thrift or Protobuf                          Experience with Github, JIRA & Confluence

column2: As a Senior Architect, you will work to deliver the vision of the department through process, development, and lifecycle.; Seamlessly switch between roles of an Individual Contributor, team member, and Power BI Architect as demanded by each project to define, design, and deliver actionable insights.     On a typical day, you might     Formulate and recommend standards for achieving maximum performance and efficiency in the Data Management ecosystem.     Develop and maintain the Data layer (DM or DWH) for the aggregation, validation, and presentation of data for reporting layer.     Develop or coach the team members to develop reports, dashboards, and related database views/stored procedures.     Evangelize self-service BI and visual discovery.     Interview stakeholders and develop a BI roadmap for success based on project prioritization and budget.     Design & promote best BI practices by championing data quality, integrity, and reliability.     Coach BI team members as a technology SME.     Provide on-the-job training for new or less experienced team members.     Partner with the sales and presales team to build BI-related solutions and proposals.     Ideate an end-end architecture for a given problem statement.     Interact and collaborate with multiple teams (Data Science, Consulting & Engineering) and various stakeholders to meet deadlines, to bring Analytical Solutions to life.         What do we expect         13+ years of experience in delivering comprehensive BI solutions (   Power BI   , Tableau & Qlik) and 5+ years of    experience in Power BI     Real-time experience working in OLAP & OLTP database models (Dimensional models).     Comprehensive knowledge of SQL & modern DM environments (Synapse, Snowflake & Redshift).     Effortless in relational database concepts, flat file processing concepts, and software development lifecycle.     Adept understanding of any of the cloud services is preferred (   Azure   , AWS & GCP).     ETL technology exposure & experience in a scripting language would be value addition.     Enthuse to collaborate with various stakeholders across the organization and take complete ownership of deliverables

column2: As an Architect, you will work to solve some of the most complex and captivating data management problems that would enable them as a data-driven organization     Seamlessly switch between roles of an Individual Contributor, team member, and Data Modeling Architect as demanded by each project to define, design, and deliver actionable insights.     On a typical day, you might     Engage the clients & understand the business requirements to translate those into data models.     Analyze customer problems, propose solutions from a data structural perspective, and estimate and deliver proposed solutions.     Create and maintain a Logical Data Model (LDM) and Physical Data Model (PDM) by applying best practices to provide business insights.     Use the Data Modelling tool to create appropriate data models     Create and maintain the Source to Target Data Mapping document that includes documentation of all entities, attributes, data relationships, primary and foreign key structures, allowed values, codes, business rules, glossary terms, etc.     Gather and publish Data Dictionaries.     Ideate, design, and guide the teams in building automations and accelerators     Involve in maintaining data models as well as capturing data models from existing databases and recording descriptive information.     Contribute to building data warehouse & data marts (on Cloud) while performing data profiling and quality analysis.     Use version control to maintain versions of data models.     Collaborate with Data Engineers to design and develop data extraction and integration code modules.     Partner with the data engineers & testing practitioners to strategize ingestion logic, consumption patterns & testing.     Ideate to design & develop the next-gen data platform by collaborating with cross-functional stakeholders.     Work with the client to define, establish and implement the right modelling approach as per the requirement     Help define the standards and best practices     Involve in monitoring the project progress to keep the leadership teams informed on the milestones, impediments, etc.     Coach team members, and review code artifacts.     Contribute to proposals and RFPs         What do we expect         10+ years of experience in Data space.     Decent SQL knowledge     Able to suggest modeling approaches for a given problem.     Significant experience in one or more RDBMS (Oracle, DB2, and SQL Server)     Real-time experience working in OLAP & OLTP database models (Dimensional models).     Comprehensive understanding of Star schema, Snowflake schema, and Data Vault Modelling. Also, on any ETL tool, Data Governance, and Data quality.     Eye to analyze data & comfortable with following agile methodology.     Adept understanding of any of the cloud services is preferred (Azure, AWS & GCP)     Enthuse to coach team members & collaborate with various stakeholders across the organization and take complete ownership of deliverables.     Experience in contributing to proposals and RFPs     Good experience in stakeholder management     Decent communication and experience in leading the team

column2: Are you an experienced software engineer with expertise in Snowflake? Are you looking for an exciting new opportunity to level-up your career? Look no further, because Emids Technologies Pvt Ltd is currently seeking a talented Senior Software Engineer (Snowflake) to join our team!    Job Title: Senior Software Engineer (Snowflake) RR/526/2024  Company: Emids Technologies Pvt Ltd  Location: Bangalore/Hyderabad/Noida    As a Senior Software Engineer (Snowflake) at Emids Technologies Pvt Ltd, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing scalable and efficient solutions for data integration, analytics, and reporting using Snowflake. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.    Key Responsibilities:  - Design, develop, and implement data pipelines and ETL processes using Snowflake and other relevant tools.  - Work with business stakeholders to understand requirements and propose technical solutions that meet their needs.  - Work with data engineers and data scientists to build and optimize data models and data transformation processes in Snowflake.  - Collaborate with the cloud infrastructure team to ensure optimal performance and scalability of Snowflake data warehouse.  - Leverage best practices in data warehousing and database design to optimize database performance and ensure data quality.  - Participate in code reviews and provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior engineers.  - Stay up to date with the latest industry trends and technologies related to Snowflake and data engineering.    Required Skills and Qualifications:  - Bachelor?? degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.  - 4+ years of experience in software development with a focus on Snowflake data platform.  - Proficiency in SQL and experience in working with large-scale data warehouses.  - Strong understanding of data warehousing concepts, including data modeling, ETL processes, and data integration.  - Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure is a plus.  - Strong problem-solving skills and ability to communicate complex technical solutions to non-technical stakeholders.  - Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.    Emids Technologies Pvt Ltd is a leading global technology solutions company, providing clients with high-quality services and innovative solutions across various industries. We value diversity, teamwork, and continuous learning, and we are committed to providing our employees with opportunities for growth and career development.    If you are a talented software engineer with a passion for Snowflake and data engineering, and if you are looking for an exciting new challenge, we would love to hear from you! Join our dynamic team at Emids Technologies Pvt Ltd and take your career to the next level. Apply now and be part of our success story!    Roles and Responsibilities   Senior Software Engineer (Snowflake) RR/526/2024

column1: Primavera SaaS (Oracle Primavera P6 EPPM Cloud) Implementation
column2: Skills       Consultant Primavera SaaS (Oracle Primavera P6 EPPM Cloud) Implementation       Job Description               As a Consultant - Primavera solutions you will play a lead role in supporting customers on Primavera SaaS (Oracle Primavera P6 EPPM Cloud) deployment     This will require you to work closely with the customer & Oracle     Also need to act as a SPOC for any Primavera related tasks, issues, and queries     You will be working with offshore technical and functional support team to implement solution including migration, configuration, and integration along with issue resolution     You will play a pivotal role in planning, design, coordination and execution from customer site     Also need to work along with Oracle Success Manager to implement and coordinate Oracle dependent task for P6 EPPM on Cloud             Responsibilities           Responsible for overall Primavera SaaS (Oracle Primavera P6 EPPM Cloud) latest version implementation and lead configuration, migration & integration.     Coordinating with Oracle for environment provisioning and fine tuning     Conducting workshops (discovery phase) with different stack holders to capture & document the requirements.      Analysis and understand existing project management system and create migration strategy to move projects to Primavera for SaaS deployment.     Design, update & develop the functional documents for configuration, migration & integration.     Responsible for configuring Single Sign on(SSO) & Active Directory (AD) integration for P6 EPPM on cloud (SaaS)     Close coordination with client team for integration of Primavera with inhouse applications     Execute and support System Integration Testing (SIT) and User Acceptance Testing (UAT)     Responsible for training material preparation and conducting Business User trainings across geos on product features.     Coordinating with application vendor Oracle and infrastructure support teams like DBA, Security, Citrix, network etc.     Providing Subject matter expertise in Primavera application to the customer for its effective usage       Required             10+ years strong experience in most recent Primavera versions     Hands on experience of Primavera modules: P6 EPPM(Web), P6 Professional, P6 API, P6 Web Services     Experience in P6 API, REST API or P6 Web service for developing interface design is must.     Experience in P6 EPPM on Cloud (SaaS) implementation is must.     Experience in integration of Primavera with other applications is must.     Experience in migration of large number of projects from project management system to Primavera on SaaS deployment     Knowledge on Project Online & Microsoft Project would be a plus.     Should have project planning and scheduling background in EPC projects to resolve user queries on Primavera functionality.     Oracle certification in Primavera would be a plus         Secondary skills (not compulsory)         Worked on onsite-offshore model with effective handover to offshore consultants & developers   Personal      Besides the professional qualifications of the candidates we place great importance in addition to various forms personality profile.         These include:         High analytical skills     A high degree of initiative and flexibility     High customer orientation     High quality awareness     Excellent verbal and written communication skills

column2: Data Quality Solution Design:    Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand data quality requirements and design data quality solutions using the Informatica Data Quality platform.           Data Profiling and Analysis:    Conduct data profiling and analysis to identify data quality issues and recommend strategies for data cleansing and enrichment.           Data Quality Rules:    Develop and implement data quality rules, transformations, and mappings in Informatica Data Quality to address data quality issues.           Data Quality Monitoring:    Implement data quality monitoring processes to continuously assess and report on data quality metrics and issues.           Data Governance:    Contribute to data governance initiatives by establishing data quality standards, policies, and procedures.           Data Integration:    Work with data integration teams to ensure that data quality processes are integrated into data pipelines and ETL processes.           Documentation:    Maintain documentation of data quality solutions, processes, and best practices.           Training and Support:    Provide training and support to end-users and data stewards on data quality tools and processes. column2: Project Role : Data Architect Project Role Description : Define the data requirements and structure for the application. Model and design the application data structure, storage and integration.  Must have skills : Data Architecture Principles Good to have skills : Data Modeling Techniques and Methodologies, Google Cloud Platform Architecture Minimum  12  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Data Architecture Certification Summary :As a Data Architect, you will be responsible for defining the data requirements and structure for the application. Your typical day will involve modeling and designing the application data structure, storage, and integration using your expertise in Data Architecture Principles.  Roles & Responsibilities: Define and maintain the data architecture principles, standards, guidelines, and solutions for the organization. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and design data models that align with the organization's goals and objectives. Develop and maintain data models, data dictionaries, and data flow diagrams for the organization's data architecture. Design and implement data integration solutions that enable the organization to efficiently and effectively manage its data assets. Ensure data quality, integrity, and security by implementing appropriate data governance policies and procedures. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Expertise in Data Architecture Principles. Good To Have Skills:Knowledge of Data Modeling Techniques and Methodologies, Google Cloud Platform Architecture. Strong understanding of data management concepts, including data modeling, data integration, data warehousing, and data governance. Experience with data modeling tools such as ERwin, ER/Studio, or PowerDesigner. Experience with data integration tools such as Informatica, Talend, or MuleSoft. Experience with database technologies such as Oracle, SQL Server, or MySQL. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 12 years of experience in Data Architecture Principles. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, information technology, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification Data Architecture Certification

column2: KPMG entities in India are professional services firm(s). These Indian member firms are affiliated with KPMG International Limited. KPMG was established in India in August 1993. Our professionals leverage the global network of firms, and are conversant with local laws, regulations, markets and competition. KPMG has offices across India in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Gurugram, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Kochi, Kolkata, Mumbai, Noida, Pune, Vadodara and Vijayawada.? KPMG entities in India offer services to national and international clients in India across sectors. We strive to provide rapid, performance-based, industry-focussed and technology-enabled services, which reflect a shared knowledge of global and local industries and our experience of the Indian business environment. KPMG India has a policy of providing equal opportunity for all applicants and employees regardless of their color, caste, religion, age, sex/gender, national origin, citizenship, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability or other legally protected status. KPMG India values diversity and we request you to submit the details below to support us in our endeavor for diversity. Providing the below information is voluntary and refusal to submit such information will not be prejudicial to you. This is full-time role focused on IT Projects with the ability to deliver against strict deadlines and business requirements. The person will work on a variety of projects in a highly collaborative, fast-paced environment. The person will be responsible for software development activities of KPMG, India. Part of the development team, he/she will work on the full life cycle of the process, develop code and unit testing. He/she will work closely with Technical Architect, Business Analyst, user interaction designers, and other software engineers to develop new product offerings and improve existing ones. Additionally, the person will ensure that all development practices are in compliance with KPMG?? best practices policies and procedures. This role requires quick ramp up on new technologies whenever required.

column2: Responsibilities A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to lead the engagement effort of providing high-quality and value-adding consulting solutions to customers at different stages- from problem definition to diagnosis to solution design, development and deployment.  You will review the proposals prepared by consultants, provide guidance, and analyze the solutions defined for the client business problems to identify any potential risks and issues.  You will identify change Management requirements and propose a structured approach to client for managing the change using multiple communication mechanisms.  You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance.  You would be a key contributor in unit-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high-quality, value-adding consulting solutions to customers adhering to the guidelines and processes of the organization. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements: Primary skills: Technology->ETL & Data Quality->IBM Infosphere Datastage  Preferred Skills:  Technology->ETL & Data Quality->IBM Infosphere Datastage  Additional Responsibilities: Good knowledge on software configuration management systems Strong business acumen, strategy and cross-industry thought leadership Awareness of latest technologies and Industry trends Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate Two or three industry domain knowledge  Understanding of the financial processes for various types of projects and the various pricing models available Client Interfacing skills Knowledge of SDLC and agile methodologies  Project and Team management  Educational Requirements Bachelor of Engineering  Service Line Data & Analytics Unit *  Location of posting is subject to business requirements

column2: Responsibilities A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys consulting team, your primary role would be to actively aid the consulting team in different phases of the project including problem definition, effort estimation, diagnosis, solution generation and design and deployment  You will explore the alternatives to the recommended solutions based on research that includes literature surveys, information available in public domains, vendor evaluation information, etc. and build POCs  You will create requirement specifications from the business needs, define the to-be-processes and detailed functional designs based on requirements.  You will support configuring solution requirements on the products; understand if any issues, diagnose the root-cause of such issues, seek clarifications, and then identify and shortlist solution alternatives  You will also contribute to unit-level and organizational initiatives with an objective of providing high quality value adding solutions to customers. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements: We are looking for candidates having a minimum of 2 years of hands on experience in development & implementation using latest versions OBIEE, ODI various modules of Oracle BI Apps. The candidates should have the ability to appreciate user requirements in BI domain and converting the same to design specs and architecting solutions.  We also require candidates with experience in Data Modeling for a BI Data Warehouse with an understanding of implications for ETL as well as reporting needs.
