column2: Project Role : Application Lead Project Role Description : Lead the effort to design, build and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact.  Must have skills : Informatica MDM Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : 15 years fulltime education  Summary :As an Application Lead for Software Development, you will be responsible for leading the effort to design, build, and configure applications, acting as the primary point of contact. Your typical day will involve working with Informatica MDM and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project delivery.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and implementation of Informatica MDM solutions, ensuring adherence to best practices and standards. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business analysts, developers, and testers, to ensure successful project delivery. Act as the primary point of contact for the project, providing guidance and support to team members and stakeholders. Provide technical leadership and mentorship to team members, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices. Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality, performance, and scalability. Stay updated with the latest advancements in Informatica MDM and related technologies, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in Informatica MDM. Good To Have Skills:Experience in Informatica PowerCenter, Oracle, SQL Server, and Unix/Linux. Solid understanding of data modeling and data integration concepts. Experience in designing and implementing complex data integration solutions. Strong understanding of ETL concepts and experience in designing and developing ETL workflows. Experience in performance tuning and optimization of Informatica MDM solutions. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in Informatica MDM. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification 15 years fulltime education

Must have skills : SAP BusinessObjects Data Services Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : Graduate Summary :As an Application Lead for Custom Software Engineering, you will be responsible for leading the effort to design, build, and configure applications using SAP BusinessObjects Data Services. Your typical day will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams, analyzing complex data sets, and ensuring the successful delivery of impactful data-driven solutions.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and implementation of SAP BusinessObjects Data Services applications, acting as the primary point of contact for the project. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze complex data sets, employing statistical methodologies and data munging techniques for actionable insights. Ensure the successful delivery of impactful data-driven solutions, utilizing a strong understanding of SAP BusinessObjects Data Services and related technologies. Communicate technical findings effectively to stakeholders, utilizing data visualization tools for clarity. Stay updated with the latest advancements in SAP BusinessObjects Data Services and related technologies, integrating innovative approaches for sustained competitive advantage. Professional & Technical Skills:Mandatory:S/4 HANA implementation work experience. Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in SAP BusinessObjects Data Services. Good To Have Skills:Experience with related technologies such as SAP HANA, SAP BW, and SAP ECC. Solid grasp of statistical analysis and data munging techniques, including data cleaning, transformation, and normalization to ensure data quality and integrity. Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI. Experience in leading the design, development, and implementation of SAP BusinessObjects Data Services applications. Strong understanding of software engineering principles and methodologies. Additional Information:Industry experience:Life sciences The candidate should have a minimum of 7.5 years of experience in SAP BusinessObjects Data Services. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science, software engineering, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering impactful data-driven solutions. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification Graduate

Primary Skill :    SQL, SSIS, Data integration,        Secondary Skill:      Boomi, MuleSoft,      Familiarity with Microservice Architecture and RESTful services         Data Integration Engineer         Section 1: Position Summary           As a Data Integration Engineer at Ascensus, you will be working in a high-energy team to make data available. Passion for software development, data, creative problem solving, and rapid delivery are critical. We are building teams that are empowered to solve the business needs by having a rapid development and deployment. On this team, you ll work with areas of the business to understand their data needs - then write code and/or use Boomi, SSIS, and other tools to make that data available to them. If you have a software engineering background and a passion for data integration, this is the position for you.               Section 2: Job Functions, Essential Duties and Responsibilities             Analyze, implement, test, document and maintain new and current data solutions in support of achieving the business goals.         Design, develop, and maintain data integration solutions using Boomi.         Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and solve complex data integration challenges.         Ensure data accuracy, completeness, and consistency across multiple systems.         Develop and implement data integration best practices and standards.         Support people and process improvement strategies for the organization.         Responsible for protecting, securing, and proper handling of all confidential data held by Ascensus to ensure against unauthorized access, improper transmission, and/or unapproved disclosure of information that could result in harm to Ascensus or our clients.         Our I-Client service philosophy and our Core Values of People Matter, Quality First and Integrity Always should be visible in your actions on a day to day basis showing your support of our organizational culture.         Assist with other tasks and projects as assigned             Section 3: Experience, Skills, Knowledge Requirements             3+ years of experience developing software or systems for small to medium business environments         Strong understanding of data integration concepts and methodologies.         Experience with SSIS, Boomi, MuleSoft or other integration platforms.         Experience in software engineering and web development - preferably using C# and JavaScript         Experience with various data formats such as XML, JSON, and CSV.         Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.         Strong communication and collaboration skills.         Good experience with the Microsoft technology stack, including SQL Server and PowerBI         Familiarity with Microservice Architecture and RESTful services         Familiarity with CSS and HTML         Strong knowledge of object-oriented design, data structures and algorithms         Experience with working with legacy code               10+ years of experience in software development with excellent communication, problem solving, analytical and collaboration skills          Hands on experience in software development, data analysis, data integration projects/methodologies.         Experience with SSIS and SQL. Knowledge on other integration platforms such as Boomi, MuleSoft is a plus.         Experience in software engineering and web development - preferably using C# and JavaScript         Experience with various data formats such as XML, JSON, and CSV.         Familiarity with Microservice Architecture and RESTful services         Familiarity with CSS and HTML          Good experience with the Microsoft technology stack, including SQL Server and PowerBI         Strong knowledge of object-oriented design, data structures and algorithms         Experience with working with legacy code

column2: Job Title             : Architect-Data Modeling Location              : Chennai, Hyderabad, Bangalore  To start the project the Need : Immediate Joiner + Short Joiners  Responsibilities : As an Architect, you will work to solve some of the most complex and captivating data management problems that would enable them as a data-driven organization; Seamlessly switch between roles of an Individual Contributor, team member, and  Data Modeling Architect  as demanded by each project to define, design, and deliver actionable insights. On a typical day, you might Engage the clients & understand the business requirements to translate those into  data   models.    Create and maintain a  Logical Data Model (LDM) and Physical Data Model (PDM)    by applying best practices to provide business insights. Create and maintain the Source to Target  Data Mapping  document that includes documentation of all entities, attributes, data relationships, primary and foreign key structures, allowed values, codes, business rules, glossary terms, etc.  Gather and publish  Data Dictionaries.   Involve in  maintaining data models  as well as capturing data models from existing databases and recording descriptive information. Build  data warehouse & data marts (on Cloud)  while performing data profiling and quality analysis. Use version control to maintain versions of  data models. Design and develop data extraction and integration  code modules. Partner with the  data engineers & testing practitioners to strategize ingestion  logic, consumption patterns & testing. Ideate to design & develop the next-gen data platform by collaborating with cross functional stakeholders. Involve in monitoring the project progress to keep the leadership teams informed on the milestones, impediments, etc. Coach team members, and review code artifacts.  Preferred candidate profile   10+ years of experience in Data space.  Significant experience in one or more  RDBMS (Oracle, DB2, and SQL Server)  Real-time experience working in  OLAP & OLTP database models (Dimensional models).  Comprehensive understanding of  Star schema, Snowflake schema, and Data Vault Modelling. Also, on any  ETL tool, Data Governance, and Data quality.  Eye to analyze data & comfortable with following agile methodology.  Adept understanding of any of the  cloud services is preferred (Azure, AWS & GCP)  Enthuse to coach team members & collaborate with various stakeholders across the organization and take complete ownership of deliverables. Perks and benefits   BEST  as  per Industry Standards To start the project the Need : Immediate Joiner + Short Joiners  ANY Questions Please call -           9711881242 ( Mohit )         |     +91 86677 10407  ( raghav) Email your profile :       mohitkiran@hashtagglobal.org      |   raghavendra@hashtagglobal.org

column2: Software Developers at IBM are the backbone of our strategic initiatives to design, code, test, and provide industry-leading solutions that make the world run today - planes and trains take off on time, bank transactions complete in the blink of an eye and the world remains safe because of the work our software developers do. Whether you are working on projects internally or for a client, software development is critical to the success of IBM and our clients worldwide. At IBM, you will use the latest software development tools, techniques and approaches and work with leading minds in the industry to build solutions you can be proud of. Your Role and Responsibilities As an MDM Data Engineer, you would be responsible for Define Master Data Architecture: Lead the design and maintenance of the Master Data architecture, ensuring scalability, flexibility, and alignment with industry best practices. Utilize advanced data modeling techniques to effectively model enterprise data domains such as Patient, Provider, Product, Customer, and Finance. #ISATSELQ224 #ISATSELQ224 #ISATSELQ224 Required Technical and Professional Expertise Overall experience of 18+ years of Industry experience. 15+ Years of experience on IBM MDM  Strong technical background in Master & Reference Data Management. In-depth, hands-on knowledge of best practices for building core MDM capabilities including Workflow, Matching, Hierarchy Management, and Security. 5+ years of MDM development, administration, and integrations experience. 10+ years of direct experience in MDM analysis, design, development, support, and operations with at least two leading MDM tool suites. 5+ years of technical knowledge on Data Architecture and Data Integration. Full life cycle implementation experience in MDM Solution in various domains such as Customer, Party, and Product, including additions, extension, business rule, PME tuning. 10-12 years of Java J2EE development & Python coding. At least 8 years of working experience in SOA technologies, tools, and governance. Experience with related Data Governance concepts and solutions (Business Glossaries, Data Catalog, Data Quality analysis and remediation, Data Lineage). Familiar with MDM trends, concepts, and available tools in the market including MDM solutions, AI/ML with MDM. In-depth knowledge and practical experience in managing Data Supply Chain and Data Lifecycle. Hands-on expert in data analysis within and outside data warehouse, data consolidation, and data management/governance. Able to lead a team and review designs independently, lead code reviews, and ensure quality throughout the project's life. Demonstrates strong communication, analytical, and organizational skills. Ability to manage day-to-day interactions effectively and relationships with a diverse group of colleagues. Experience resolving technical incidents and issues with the MDM product. Experienced in installation and Upgrades. Experienced in MDM Backup & recovery strategy. Experienced in Performance tuning. Knowledge of BAW and stewardship UI. Knowledge of Consent implementation. Knowledge of Account, Macro role & Party Relationship is required. Knowledge of tagging and onboarding data stewards. Knowledge of LDAP integration. Knowledge of Handler & composite view implementation. Knowledge of Notification. Knowledge of MDM Reporting strategy. Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise Experience with other database platforms and technologies (e.g., DB2,Oracle, SQL Server). Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration tools. Knowledge of database regulatory compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).

column2: Job Description: We are seeking a skilled Snowflake Architect with 8-10 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, implementing, and managing Snowflake solutions to support our data infrastructure needs. As a Snowflake Architect, you will collaborate closely with crossfunctional teams to develop scalable and efficient data architecture solutions aligned with business objectives. Responsibilities: Design and implement Snowflake data warehouses, data lakes, and data pipelines to meet business requirements. Architect and optimize Snowflake databases for performance, scalability, and reliability. Develop and maintain ETL processes using Snowflake's native features or third-party tools. Collaborate with data engineers, data scientists, and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and translate them into technical solutions. Implement best practices for data governance, security, and compliance within the Snowflake environment. Provide technical guidance and mentorship to junior team members on Snowflake architecture and best practices. Stay updated on the latest Snowflake features, tools, and trends in the data warehousing space. Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Snowflake data platform performance, data integrity, and data integration. Proficiency in complex SQL, Unix Shell/Python Scripting, performance tuning and database optimization techniques. Make necessary to modelling principles, processes, solutions, and best practices to ensure that the Snowflake is aligned with business needs of the environment. Requirements: Bachelors degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field. 8-10 years of experience working with data warehousing technologies, with at least 3 years of hands-on experience with Snowflake. Strong expertise in designing and implementing Snowflake data warehouses, including schema design, query optimization, and performance tuning. Proficiency in SQL and experience with scripting languages like Python or Scala. Experience building and optimizing ETL pipelines using tools like Snowflake's native features, Informatica, or Talend. Solid understanding of cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform, with specific experience in deploying and managing Snowflake on one of these platforms. Excellent communication skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex issues in a fast-paced environment. Experience in designing and building manual or auto ingestion data pipeline using Snow pipe. Experience in re-clustering of the data in Snowflake with good understanding on Micro-Partitions. Experience in Migration processes to Snowflake from on-premises database environment. SnowPro or similar Snowflake certification is a plus. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to work on a variety of projects and industries. Opportunity to work with a team of experienced and talented professionals. Access to cutting-edge tools and technologies. Opportunity to grow and develop your skills through ongoing learning and development opportunities.
